tool_description: This API will help you generate questions from text using AI. For now, only English is supported, other languages will be supported soon.
name: Generate Questions from Text
title: Generate Questions from Text

api_list.name: Generate Questions from Text
api_list.description:
### Generate Questions from Text

This endpoint will help you generate questions from English text.

### Request Body

- "context":  must be more than 10 characters and less than 1000 characters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-questions-from-text.p.rapidapi.com/ai/question/generator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-questions-from-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
